MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Holywood and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair on a piece of equipment on our overhead line network, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30AM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.36AM on 15 November 2020.
